LanguageData.Plant_Bush.label: bush
LanguageData.Plant_Bush.description: Bushes are a type of green, short shrubbery. Unlike other plants this one is incapable of producing fruits or vegetables.
LanguageData.Plant_Rhododendron.label: Plant_Rhododendron
LanguageData.Plant_Rhododendron.description: An attractive, hardy, and slow-growing shrub known for its beautiful flowers.
LanguageData.Plant_SwordFern.label: Plant_SwordFern
LanguageData.Plant_SwordFern.description: An attractive and hardy fern. Not eaten by most animals due to toxins and carcinogens.
LanguageData.Plant_Alocasia.label: alocasia
LanguageData.Plant_Clivia.label: clivia
LanguageData.Plant_Clivia.description: An unusual plant with tall, pretty flowers. Some call it the 'bush lily'.
LanguageData.Plant_Rafflesia.label: giant rafflesia
LanguageData.Plant_Rafflesia.description: A rare, giant flower. You would think a giant flower would be beautiful, but this one is quite smelly and ugly.
